class.name: RMLElement
class.brief_description: A reference to a element in a [class RMLDocument] document.
class.description: This class references a element inside a document and allows direct modification to class names, id, attributes and style properties, as well adding and removing childs.

method.name: add_event_listener
append_child
method.description: Appends [param child] as a child of this element.

method.name: clear_children
method.description: Clears all the children of this element.

method.name: get_attribute
method.description: Gets the attribute [param name], if the element doesn't have this attribute, returns [param default_value].

method.name: get_child
method.description: Returns the child at [param index].

method.name: get_child_count
method.description: Returns the number of children this element have.

method.name: get_children
method.description: Returns the list of children of this element.

method.name: get_class_names
method.description: Returns the list of class names of this element.

method.name: get_id
method.description: Gets the ID of this element.

method.name: get_inner_rml
method.description: Returns the inner RML of this element.

method.name: get_parent
method.description: Returns the parent of this element.

method.name: get_property
method.description: Gets the style property [param name], if the element doesn't have this property, returns [param default_value].

method.name: get_rect
method.description: Returns the bounding rectangle of this element in document space.

method.name: get_tag_name
method.description: Gets the tag name of this element.

method.name: get_text_content
method.description: Returns a list of text from text nodes as direct or indirect child.

method.name: has_class
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if this element has [param class].

method.name: is_valid
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] when this RMLElement references a valid element. [b]Note:[/b] The methods on this class never returns an [code]null[/code] RMLElement, but the object can reference a null element in RmlUi. In this case, if the GDExtension is built with [code]element_reference_strict=no[/code] flag which is the default, the methods does nothing and/or returns default values. Enabling the flag throws errors on runtime when trying to manipulate a invalid reference.

method.name: query_selector
method.description: Selects the first direct or indirect child of this element which matches [param selector].

method.name: query_selector_all
method.description: Selects all direct and indirect childs of this element which matches [param selector].

method.name: remove_attribute
method.description: Removes attribute [param name] from the element.

method.name: remove_child
method.description: Removes [param child] as a child of this element.

method.name: remove_class
method.description: Toggles [param class] from the list of class names of this element.

method.name: remove_event_listener
method.description: Removes the [param listener] as a listener of the event with name [param event_id].

method.name: remove_property
method.description: Removes style property [param name] from the element.

method.name: set_attribute
method.description: Sets attribute [param name] to [param value].

method.name: set_class
method.description: Adds [param class] in the list of class names of this element.

method.name: set_class_names
method.description: Sets the list of class names of this element to [param class_names].

method.name: set_id
method.description: Sets the ID of this element to [param id].

method.name: set_inner_rml
method.description: Sets the inner RML of this element, clears all it's children and replaces then with new elements based on [param rml].

method.name: set_property
method.description: Sets style property [param name] to [param value].

method.name: set_text_content
method.description: Sets the text content of this element, clears all it's children and replaces then with a single text element with [param text] as it's content.

method.name: toggle_class
method.description: Toggles [param class] in the list of class names of this element.
